    • getOutput

      public double getOutput(int v)
      Computes output for this node by getting input from the in-Edge.
      Specified by:
      getOutput in interface NeuralNetElement

    • getSigma

      public double getSigma(int v)
      Compute the error for this node. This calls getOutput to ensure a current version of the output exists.
      Specified by:
      getSigma in interface NeuralNetElement

    • update

      public void update(int v)
      This update simply calls update on the inEdges.
      Specified by:
      update in interface NeuralNetElement
      Parameters:
      v - - v is the version of the neural net state. If the node has a different version recorded for its sigma value, it will recompute it. If the versions match, then no recomputation is necessary.
